conbody.p: The Top Buckets report gives an overview of the buckets with the most read and write operations.
In this report, you find the following information:

ul.li: Reads: the number of read operations during the selected period.
Writes: the number of write operations during the selected period.

conbody.p: Only the first five records are displayed, but you can scroll in the table to get the complete overview.

You can also sort the table by clicking on the column’s header row. For example when you click on Reads, you sort the buckets by number of read operations.You can easily switch between ascending and descending order by clicking again on the column’s header.
